NUMPOLLIES 32
// -------------triangle corridor-----------------
//floor 1
0.0 0.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -70.0
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -70.0
//2
0.0 0.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 0.0 10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -70.0

//left 3
0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -70.0
1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -70.0
//4
0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 10.0
1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -70.0

//right 5
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 10.0
0.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -70.0
0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -70.0
//6
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 10.0
0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -70.0

// -------------big room-----------------
// floor 7
0.0 0.0 -30.0 -10.0 -70.0
0.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -130.0
1.0 1.0 30.0 -10.0 -130.0
//8
0.0 0.0 -30.0 -10.0 -70.0
1.0 0.0 30.0 -10.0 -70.0
1.0 1.0 30.0 -10.0 -130.0

// left back 9
1.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -70.0
0.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -70.0
0.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -70.0
//10
1.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -70.0
1.0 0.0 -10.0 10.0 -70.0
0.0 0.0 -30. 10.0 -70.0

//11
0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -70.0
0.0 0.0 -10.0 10.0 -70.0
1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -70.0

//left along 12
0.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -70.0
0.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -70.0
1.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -90.0
//13
0.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -70.0
1.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -90.0
1.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -90.0

// 14 two triangles
0.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -90.0
0.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -90.0
1.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -100.0
//15
1.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -110.0
1.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -110.0
0.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -100.0

// 16
0.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -110.0

1.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -130.0
//17

1.0 0.0 -30.0 10.0 -130.0
1.0 1.0 -30.0 -10.0 -130.0

//front wall 18

1.0 0.0 -10.0 10.0 -130.0
//19

1.0 0.0 -10.0 10.0 -130.0

//right back 20

0.0 1.0 30.0 -10.0 -70.0
0.0 0.0 30.0 10.0 -70.0
//21
